risks.description: Brute-force login attempts may allow an attacker to guess the password.
risks.qa_focus: Validate account lockout after 3 failed attempts and confirm no further login is allowed during lock period.

risks.description: MFA bypass if the SMS one-time code can be reused or does not expire properly.
risks.qa_focus: Verify that an expired code is always rejected and that a new login requires a fresh code.

risks.description: SMS delivery failure could block legitimate users from logging in.
risks.qa_focus: Test resend flow and ensure only one resend is allowed. Verify no infinite resend.

risks.description: Login attempts may not be correctly logged for audit/security traceability.
risks.qa_focus: Ensure every attempt (success/failure/lockout) is logged with timestamp and account reference.
